Adinarayana]] (General Secretary) |website= |footnotes= }} '''Visakha Steel Workers Union''', a [[trade union]] of [[steel]] workers at [[Visakhapatnam Steel Plant]], in [[Visakhapatnam]], [[India]]. VSWU is affiliated with the [[All India Trade Union Congress]]. In March 2008 VSWU, contesting union elections in coalition with the [[Centre of Indian Trade Unions|CITU]]-affiliated [[Steel Plant Employees Union]], regained the union recognition at the plant. The AITUC-CITU front won 6,597 votes against 4,361 votes for the [[INTUC]]-affiliated [[Visakha Steel Employees' Congress]].<ref>http://www.thehindubusinessline.com/2008/03/03/stories/2008030350451500.htm</ref> The general secretary of VSWU is D. Adinarayana.<ref>http://www.hindu.com/2007/12/06/stories/2007120651980500.htm</ref><ref>http://www.hindu.com/2005/11/04/stories/2005110402730200.htm</ref> ==References== {{Reflist}} {{Portal|Organized labour}} [[Category:Trade unions of the Visakhapatnam Steel Plant]] [[Category:All India Trade Union Congress]] [[Category:Metal trade unions]] {{India-trade-union-stub}}
